Juventus: a new nugget torn free?
The Old Lady would like to attract one of the biggest hopes of the Mancunian club this summer for free. A new blow to the Coman?
01 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Rafael Da Silva



Manchester UnitedManchester United is preparing to tackle a pivotal season. Deprived of the Champions League and sixth in the last Premier League championship, the Red Devils must return to the top in the coming months. With which eleven-type? Icon Sport



David de GeaIcon Sport



Luke ShawIcon Sport



Chris SmallingIcon Sport



Victor Lindel√∂fIcon Sport



Aaron Wan-BissakaIcon Sport



Paul PogbaIcon Sport



Nemanja MatiƒáIcon Sport



Anthony MartialIcon Sport



Jesse LingardIcon Sport



Marcus RashfordIcon Sport



Romelu LukakuIcon Sport

Manchester United: the possible eleven of the season




In recent years, Juventus has made its specialty to make big shots by attracting players for free. The most outstanding examples are Paul Pogba, Andrea Pirlo, Kingsley Coman, Dani Alves and Adrien Rabiot more recently. Players who have been present, making Bianconeri's strategy credible. And the leaders of the Piedmontese club do not wish to stop there.




Free this summer




Dutch winger grabs minutes in Europa League + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

In fact, according to Dutch media reports Vi.Nl, the Bianconeri would be interested in 19-year-old Dutch winger Manchester United Tahith Chong. Free of any contract this summer and still not prolonged with the Red Devils, his situation would have challenged the Italian club. And it is not his agent, Erkan Alkan who will say the opposite: "Yes, it is true that big clubs are wondering about the situation of Tahith. But it is still too early and we look forward to Manchester United's proposal to determine what is the best option for his career, "he said," No doubt the player should be talked about this summer ...
